name: Darksiders: Warmastered Edition
overview: Darksiders: Warmastered Edition is a remastered version of the 2010 game Darksiders, similar to Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition as a new version of Darksiders II. For PlayStation 4, Wii U and Xbox One this is the first release of the game for the platform. For PC this is an updated release. The gameplay itself is identical. This version has native 1080p rendering (console versions) and 4K support and additional video options (PC). The game runs in 60 FPS except for the Wii U version with 30 FPS. Visually there are doubled texture resolutions, improved and reworked rendering, better shadow rendering quality and new post-processing effects
